result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Markus Alexander Kuehl

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Markus Alexander Kuehl appeared by video.  Prosecuting attorney M Samir Siddique appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for indigency hearing.
Based upon the defendant's statements, the Court found the defendant ineligible for appointment of counsel at county expense.  
Court instructed defendant to retain private counsel by the next scheduled court date.
Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 30.
Status conference scheduled for November 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with JEM
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 2 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders. No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Markus Alexander Kuehl appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Alejandro A Lockwood appeared by video for Markus Alexander Kuehl.  Attorney Samuel Tyler Tabin appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Richards, Branch 30. Defense motions to dismiss Count 1: wrong initials (JAE) for alleged victim.  State moves to amend, correcting initials to JEM.  State to file an amended complaint.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty. DEFENDANT IS NOT INDIGENT. Defense request Indigency Hearing at the Pretrial Conference.  This hearing may be streamed live on Dacast at the Court's discretion: https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/76b667a0-98a1-69d4-e783-9185dc35fcc1
Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 7, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Indigency hearing scheduled for October 7, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
